website_summaries.verdict: This game-changing budget steam curler creates spiral curls in minutes. Just be careful not to put in too much hair in a single pass.
pros: 3 heat levels with maximum temperature of 450 degrees
Beeps when up to temperature and when it's time to release your curl
cons: Some concerns about trouble releasing hair - don't try to curl thick strands at once

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I wanted to try one of these contraptions because I cannot curl my hair very well. I figured $20 was a small enough price if it backfired. I tried it and love it! It gave me beautiful, quick, even curls with minimal effort!
customer_reviews.author: Natalienorris

customer_reviews.title: Look up tutorials online
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so far. The only negative is the instructions are completely unhelpful. Go on the internet and look up tutorials before you use it. Once I figured it out it was simple and highly effective. Curled my nieces hair beautifully. She has long thick poker straight hair and the miraqueen made easy work of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worldwide series
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. Product is beyond expectation, it is light weight and a worldwide series with universal voltage 110.-240v! I expected to receive the item sometime after Christmas, but surprisingly it came few days before then. I hope this curler lasting long time. Will keep update....
customer_reviews.author: Nana Hady

customer_reviews.title: needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with clear instructions so I had my hair jammed the first couple of times and then I kept trying to use it until I mastered it and I love it I can do my hair in a ponytail and then curl the end take out the ponytail and style it in 15 min it's so easy but you do have to use small pieces its great just have to play with it until you get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Veronica g

customer_reviews.title: Big beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: I received this on Sunday and have used it everyday. I cannot believe how well it works. I have tried tight curls and loose curls. It works every time. The first time I used it my hair did get caught but I didn't tug on it, just gently pulled my hair loose (just like I would if my hair got stuck in a hair brush). I was hesitant buying this as I heard reviews about peoples hair getting caught. But I figured for the price I would go for it. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Patton

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: My entire life I have wanted nothing but a head full of curls. This curler is seriously so easy to use. I was a little skeptical and scared because some of the reviews mentioned their hair getting stuck but I literally pulled this out of the package, plugged it in and put my hair in it and it worked perfectly. Didn’t pull, rip or hurt my head at all! I think this curler will be my new favorite toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this unit
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. I have shoulder length hair and followed the instructions regarding tangles however my hair will still get caught in the unit. On one attempt I didn’t think it was going to release the hair. It left a chunk of hair behind and really hurt. I will not use again. I believe it would be even worse with longer hair
customer_reviews.author: D. Avaro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This item is more than worth the money and the time it saves me to curl my hair is exceptional. Gives a lot of volume to my hair leaving it nice and shine. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tameca

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and Beautiful Curls
customer_reviews.text: I saw some of the reviews for the product so i didn't have super high expectations. LET ME TELL YOU. This is the best thing i've bought ever. I hate curling my hair. It takes a long time and i get bored after about 2/3 of my hair being done. This little device is super quick, light and convenient. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curling iron
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is amazing!! It is so easy to use and curls really well. The only advice I have is to make sure it's pointed in the right direction....There's a little reminder written on the curling iron. If not, the curls are limp. I think that's might have happened to a previous reviewer when she couldn't get it to curl....Because it seriously makes beautiful curls! My daughter has autism and hates getting her hair curled. This was so cool and incredibly easy to use that she let me do it without any issues. It's a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use a wand curling iron but my curls would fall quickly no mater what product I used. I just got my new Miraqueen curling iron and curled my hair in no time. I can run my fingers through my hair and all of the curls stay and look great. I even did a loose wrapped with a towel over my hair to keep it my hair dry while showering I thought I would lose my curls.....nope. It looks perfect. Not even frizzy after the hot shower. Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kymmie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work right!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! Out of the box it worked on about half my hair...I never could get it to beep for the time settings, and it didn’t alternate curls when I used that setting. About halfway through my hair (and I have thin hair, so not a long time) it started beeping the 4 beeps to signal time was up every single time I closed the handles regardless if hair was in the curler or not. I could sometimes fix it by turning it off and back on but then it stopped rotating and just would beep the 4 beeps, without any rotation, so I gave up. Super disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Product is not worth it
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IT RIPPED MY HAIR AND GOT TANGLED AND I HAD TO CUT MY HAIR
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUT OF THIS WORLD RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! To say that I have no talent with fixing my own hair is a Complete Understatement - I'm hopeless! This curling iron is Out of this world easy to use & Gives you Outstanding results! I wish I found it sooner!!. Tip. Use small sections of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost pulled my hair out
customer_reviews.text: This thing came without instructions. I found unclear instructions on the web and decided to try to use this. After The first piece, my hair came out as straight as it went in. I tried a second time with the same piece of hair and the damn thing jammed and nearly pulled my hair out of my hear. I think this is a dangerous item. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: smokinjj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have never curled my whole head of hair because I couldn’t figure out a curling iron. This product is amazing and well worth the money! I’m so happy I can curl my own hair now. I’m still learning how to use it better. But that’s on me. I read reviews about hair being tangled inside. However I have not had any issues with that at all. I’m guessing they tried cramming too much hair in at once. Or that the hair was tangled when putting it in and not freshly brushed. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible easy curls for very long hair
customer_reviews.text: A curling iron that curls my hair! My hair is about 30" long. This iron will curl the full length but only a lock no thicker than 1/4" at a time. Traditional irons do not provide enough heat to prevent my hair length from pulling the curl flat. My hair holds this curl! I did get my hair stuck a couple times figuring out the proper lock size but I was able to remain calm and easily yet safely remove my hair from the roller undamaged. No hair cut required per prior reviews I have read. I highly recommend this curler.
customer_reviews.author: E Brudney

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST thing I have bought on amazon!  Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It takes me 10 min to do my hair. I would rather use this then flat iron my hair. My hair is medium thickness and to my bra line and it can take a good amount of hair. Best thing I have ever used in my hair. I have curls for days with this and my hair doesn’t stay with any other tool. This Florida heat has nothing on this hair tool. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara

customer_reviews.title: Very EASY to use!!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest thing you have to remember with this curler is to NOT put too much hair in at a time or in can get tangled up. Make sure your hair is brushed very well. No knots whatsoever! Very small strands at a time and everything will go in smoothly. I also suggest parting your hair and combing again before you curl. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: heidihu2

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money! Easy perfect curls!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have trouble curling my hair due to arthritis in my wrist and also my hair doesn't hold curls well at all. When I use this curler my curls stay for a day or two. I originally bought it just for a ball I'm attending soon but I have curled my hair every day since receiving it. I can FINALLY have the curls I've always wanted. Best part too is it doesn't fry my really thin hair! It actually helps the frizz and stay slick all day with no frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: An efficient curler that results in beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use which I love about it. The efficiency of the steam curling the hair surpassed my expectations and the curls stayed on beautifully for a long time. The use of steam to curl hair has shown a huge difference in terms of the health of my hair. It is more vibrant and it isn't as dry as it was when I was using a normal heat wand curler. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these one was for a gift so I received them today and I used mine as soon as I received it I didn’t want to give the other as a gift if it didn’t work properly well not only am I excited about giving the second one as a gift I’m also ordering a third one for my granddaughters to share.... it works fantastic .... I would highly recommend this product ...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Burns

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this! my hair is completely straight and this curls it instantly and lasts for like 3 days. this was also very affordable while all the others i looked at were higher priced. you do have to be careful, it gets hot and you have to follow instructions on how to use it. i looked on youtube which was very helpful. i get a lot of compliments and asked about the product, where to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest curler ever! I can curl my hair in 20 min now! Just make sure your hair isn't tangled and it works superb. The curls turn into big waves the next day for me. Only ever done with this curler.
customer_reviews.author: irene shelly van zwieten

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product first time using it got about three sections ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product first time using it got about three sections of hair done and on the fourth time it got my daughters hair stuck and pulled her hair so hard she was bleeding! My husband had to take the whole thing apart to get her hair out as she was hysterical crying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I could of expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. Only cause I was terrified it was gonna pull my hair. But I looooove it so much. I’ve never been able to curl my hair and have it keep! With this I got tight curls, loose curls. I could change it up and was super pleased. And even if I had too tight of curls, it’s easy to come through and loosen them up! And it still holds a beautiful curl! And sooo much faster than normal!
customer_reviews.author: LilyB

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Totally dislike this. It tooks me forever to have my hair done. Faster with hot rollers. It only works if you put in little by little. Not worth my time. Too late for me to return it so have no choice but keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maringka

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a couple months now and i love it. Your arms do get tired after while. It takes me about an hour to do my hair (I have long wavy thin hair but a lot of it.). If your hair starts to get caught don't freak out! Simply stop trying to curl your hair and move your hair out of the hole. if that doesn't work then slowly curl your hair while pulling your hair out. I've only had this issue a couple of times but i've never ripped a huge chunk out of my hair. Just a couple of strands. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Joie

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair and it wouldn’t take my hair unless I did an extremely small piece so it took 30-40 mins to do my whole head. So it worked but it wasn’t any more convenient than a curler so it wasn’t really worth it to me but my 10 year old likes it, she has thin hair. So I guess silver lining
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with this ceramic curler! I have very thick, coarse, and long hair. So I was hesitant this would work well but with the price I figured it was worth the try. I am so glad I did. It is super easy to use and gives you the prettiest curls ever! I cant wait to see all the ways I can style my hair with it. Also, I anticipated that this would take me a while to do all my hair, I was so wrong. I had all of it curled in 15-20 min at the most. Love, love, love this curler!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and the results are great.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try this but wasn’t wanting to spend triple digits some sell theirs for. Watched a couple videos and felt it was worth trying and purchased it. Once it arrived I couldn’t wait to use it. I would have shared a photo but it was my gym day and I just couldn’t wait till I looked better. Sorry. But it’s easy to use lightweight and the curls are soft and consistent. Can’t wait to use it on a date night out. It’s a great way to mix up your hair style when you want a quick easy way to love your hair again! I fully recommend this curling iron and the price is fantastic! Get one and see...
customer_reviews.author: Debi Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Watch tutorial videos
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item and I've never used a device like this. I read the reviews and they say to watch tutorial videos as the instructions are not very clear and this is hands down the best advice! My hair was stuck in it twice but I know its user error and I just need to get the technique down.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works on my Long thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have long and thick hair and once I got the hang of it, my hair was curled so fast! Recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to curl my hair under 2 hours and still have all the curls in tact at the end. This is super easy and curls my hair beautifully! I didn't have to use hairspray and my curls lasted until the next day. They were way more relaxed, but you could still tell it was curled. I love this and now have an excuse to curl my hair way more often!
customer_reviews.author: Jenea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome curl
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this thing! I bought it for my daughter but I've used it more
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works great, super easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m awful at curling my own hair! I just can’t ever get it to look right. I’ve tried a curling wand, iron, and straightener and still I just can’t figure it out for the way I want it to look. Tried this as soon as it came in and it works great! For my first time using it, it only took 30 min to do my whole head and I have hair down past my mid back!! Super easy to figure out!
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Miraqueen automatic curling iron is very easy to use, very user-friendly and accomplishes the end look I always wanted with a traditional curling iron or curlers but could never achieve. I am so happy that i made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: garenee

customer_reviews.title: Fast cute curls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s birthday, because she’s been asking for one for a while. This one was cheaper than other brands, but had better reviews. I got it and she loves it. So easy to use. Her hair is cutely curled in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Trish31110

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this has bad reviews. I have had mine over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this has bad reviews. I have had mine over a year no problems. Easiest way to curl my hair. I get so many compliments all my friends want to but one now
customer_reviews.author: Tstarr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again. Just make sure your hair is dry before using.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Dude

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curls!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this thinking it would work about as well as any curling iron I’ve ever (unsuccessfully) used, but it definitely exceeded my expectations! I don’t know if there’s really any steaming going on, but the curls it produces are perfect, and last all day, which is unheard of with my super fine hair. I bought it for a wedding and looked like I’d had my hair professionally done. My sister liked it so much she ordered one for herself. Very easy to use and if the hair does get sucked in wrong it releases easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!! Works as advertises!!!
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions carefully and you will be able to manage the product really easy. This product is worth it for the value, it works really well. For years I've tried to curly my hair I was never able to reach my goals, it was always a disaster. This product is easy and you have the results quickly. If you have a long and full hair it may take a while to finish your hair since we have to use small quantity of hair in order to fit in the product. Works as advertises!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was hoping for. It is so easy to use. My daughter wanted to start curling her own hair but has had a hard time with regular wand and irons. This product was perfect. I love that you can set it to wind left, right, or alternating. The 3 heat levels and 3 different time settings are also great to get the right amount of curl. Best part was the price. Other products similar to this were 3 - 5 times more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lydiksen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think my hair was long enough... just shoulder length. Wouldn’t take the hair in every time but a few times it grabbed it and yanked it so I had to try to disentangle it. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: PHelmer

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out this curler immediately and was more than surprised at how well it worked! I had zero product in my hair beforehand and it still did a fantastic job. Also the back was easier to do than I expected. I have long thick hair that holds curls really well to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't expect much from this iron for the price, but it looked so interesting I couldn't help but give it a try. Once you figure out how simple it is to use and how great it works, you are amazed at what a great deal you just scored!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It is a fast and easy way to curl my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love it,It is a fast and easy process. It heats up fast and also very pretty. i love how you can set the temp. It is very fun to work with and i have never had curler hair
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to curl my hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this curler, I have thin shoulder length hair and it works great. You have to make sure you hold it the right way to get a good curl a little practice and it's easy
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Swenny

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this steam curler! I’ll admit it’s my first one to try so I don’t have another to compare it to, but compared to a normal curling wand it’s great! I personally don’t find this to be faster, but that’s probably because of how my natural hair is. This picture is with the 10s setting alternating curles. They’re tight curles, but with finger combing this is what it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I happened upon this product and thought it would save me some time and effort in curling my hair. I have used it 2 times now and I love it!! I am still getting used to all the buttons and how long to keep my hair in the curler. I have only tangled my hair a couple of times but as with anything, practice makes perfect. I am so glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! My straight as a board, fine hair will not hold curl, ever (my whole life)... until now! I could literally curl my hair before and it would be straight again within an hour or so. This pic is the first time I used the product, the curl held ALL DAY and the second pic is the next day, and there’s STILL curl in my hair!!! I truly thought it was impossible for me to have curls. I’m in love with this thing and have recommended to every single girlfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Fun, works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot faster than a curling iron and it's fun. You just have to make sure that your hair is clean and combed out. If it's dirty or snarled it will catch and tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes I can get soft curls. Watched a couple of YouTubes to get ideas on the best way to use it. Will take a bit of practice but it's great.
customer_reviews.author: D Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! It's a trap!
customer_reviews.text: This literally ripped hair from my head. I tried it on tiny little sections and they got stuck in the curler. I had to cut out my hair!!!!! This has been awful!
customer_reviews.author: MattP

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Did not use on wet hair but otherwise this is a great product and especially for the price. It does exactly what it says it will do. Pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have super thick / coarse hair, and have struggled with curls in the past. This magic little tool has changed my hair game 100%. Absolutely LOVE it!!! Curls stay in, and in fact look better on day 2. Super easy to use, and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chanawalt

customer_reviews.title: Love love this tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tool it's easy to use and very convenient, it is wonderful and it's quick and easy. I love love this item it's a must have for the new year
customer_reviews.author: Tavia pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve tried so many things that just take too much time, money, and life from my hair. It easy, I get beautiful curls that last ALL DAY!!!! I still can’t believe I finally found and easy product that work with my hair. Would definitely and already have recommended it to friends. I was worried about the price. But this is such a bargain buy. It works great and console affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Curls like I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: The little corkscrew curls stay all day. Curls can be worked with you hands to be soft and flowy if the tight curl is not your thing. If used as instructed it doesn't pull or break the hair. Finally something that works for my medium length thinning fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: KsH

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak on the "drying power" never used it that way. Excellent tool. Used it on a low setting and curl lasted in me and my daughter's hair for days without styling products.
customer_reviews.author: Watona

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as the $100 ones for just one fourth of the price. I'm so happy I decided to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Kuhfahl

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron gets the job done! I had wrist surgery so I was looking for something that would be easy to use with one hand. It’s fairly easy to use and this is the best my curls have stayed with a curling iron before. I took away a star for how heavy it is and that it’s not a fast process because it takes such small sections of hair (20 mins once you get it down).
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Hawes

customer_reviews.title: An amazing value for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I have super long thick hair and have never been able to curl it and have the curls stay except for with this! It makes it possible for me to give myself a style I would have had to have done in a salon before. Not only is it an amazing product, but it is an amazing value as well. Other items similar were anywhere from 60 to 150 bucks. I paid only 16.99. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Ruetz

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok buy sometimes the hair does get tangled, it works better with short hair. It is convenient and saves you time i took it on a cruise with me and curled my hair every night
customer_reviews.author: ebonee

customer_reviews.title: Catches hair
customer_reviews.text: About the fifth time, it caught my hair so I had to keep Pulling really hard. I finally got it out, but thought I would have to cut it. Would not use!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Review 4/5
customer_reviews.text: This curls really easy and I like it because it actually works. One thing I do not like about this is when I set the setting in Auto and 8 seconds curl - switch back to 12 seconds, the chamber starts acting up like it's malfunctioning and wouldn't pull my hair to curl. In order for it work again, I had to turn the speed up to 12 seconds and switch back. Otherwise, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: francis her

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: A SMALL strand of hair got stuck in this stupid thing and it had to be CUT OUT. A random chunk of hair that's very obviously missing.
customer_reviews.author: Desha Tinerella

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: recommend watching YouTube video for use. My hair never stays curled but this thing works great and my hair's stay curled!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Thank the heavens.
customer_reviews.text: The hair curler I never knew I needed. Thank you for making my hair curling sooooo much easier now!
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it and straight out rhw box had hair in the curler..
customer_reviews.author: Emily Burch

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to figure ou. Once you get it it works great. It helped watching YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: Blondey1

customer_reviews.title: Great curls with a fun tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun to use. You can only put small strands in at a time, so thick hair takes more time. Curls each curl in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Reyne Walden

customer_reviews.title: Your hair could get stuck! Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Despite this product claims that it will release if hair gets caught in it, it does NOT. Complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to use and created long-lasting, gorgeous curls in my fine, straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: As advertiisef
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter. She’s afraid it will rip her hair out so won’t try it.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbeywinds

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical to purchase this product, because it was too cheap to be good. I thought it's better to consider buying more expensive ones. In fact, it was way much better than I had expected. Very easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It’s so easy to use and really works. I have really thick medium length hair and this curls it in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: NacoleLD

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value for the cost however worked better on the longer parts of my hair than the layered shorter parts but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: paulagarza

customer_reviews.title: You can get your hair stuck, but it isnt hard to fix.
customer_reviews.text: I Love this curler. I used to use steam rollers and it took 2 sets to do my whole head. Half a day and the curl was gone. With this machine I get hair that looks naturally curly and it looks great the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ossy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: in first use after few minutes curling iron stuck with hair and didn't work any more.
customer_reviews.author: tharsini

customer_reviews.title: Year ago and still have it
customer_reviews.text: I dont get tired of this curler. I have use it every single week when i do my hair. It has been a year and she still working like the first day
customer_reviews.author: Janice Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair extremely frizzy
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It's easy to use. Just doesn't let you curl much hair at once so it takes forever. But then it really makes my hair frizz
customer_reviews.author: Kristan J Crass

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a great price. I read the instructions and read other reviews on line and this helped the first time I used this product. I like that it has the option of steam. Nice color!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite purchase! I got so many compliments on my hair. I plan on ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kamryn Payne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When used correctly the curls come out really nice but I've had issues with my hair getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer smyth

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy w/Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Curl lasts for days in my thick hair. Very Happy w/Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Some times get stuck, but if you know how to use it it's very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with it. I just have to get the use of it when it comes to making hair styles.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Silva

customer_reviews.title: No need to be afraid!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Miraqueen! I'm not very good at curling my hair because it's so long and thick. The Miraqueen makes it super quick and easy to curl my hair. I was sceptical and nervous at first that it was going to tangle my hair, but there is absolutely no reason to be afraid of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Fiancee loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancee after her last curler tried to eat her head off. She raves about it and her curls looks nice, so it's got me sold.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift and she is in love!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, it's heavy but make my hair nice!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew about this before!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used conventional curlers and curling irons. I was a little afraid to try one of these but it is so easy and it is amazing! It is so much better!! I love the product and it really works so easy. I would recommend it to anyone!! Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. So simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it this morning my hair came out perfect. No burns. And it only took ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting curls!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! The best curling product I have used in my 63 years. Absolutely love this curling iron!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: It does curl !!
customer_reviews.text: This really will curl your hair!! I have to get used to curling my left side...LOL!! But I really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Chapman

customer_reviews.title: <3 the curls.
customer_reviews.text: It works!! Beautiful curls!! I had a few accidents where my hair got caught really bad and needed help to realease it, but happy with the result, i'll try to be more careful next time. I Recomend it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, breaks your hair
customer_reviews.text: Completely tore my hair apart and causes a lot of anxiety when you hair gets caught inside. Not worth it. Curl your hair with a straightener or plain curling iron
customer_reviews.author: Moore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beach curls
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this steam curler! This is so much better than using a curling iron or hair straightener to get those beautiful beach waves and curls! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ann Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: I have poker straight hair and even still I get pretty curls and can for once in my life rock the beachy wave look. I looked at other much more expensive models and was unsure if they would actually work so I took a chance on this one and I honestly couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Curling Iron, Miraqueen Steam Curling Wand Hair Curler with Ceramic Curler
product_meta.description: Curling Iron, Hair Curler, Curling Wand
feature_bullets: 450 degree F highest heat for long-lasting curls and waves
Tourmaline ceramic technology reduces frizz and flyaways, and protects hair from damage
Professional brushless motor for precision styling; Long life motor with safety sensor for tangle-free curls high performance heater for instant even heat-up and recovery
3 heat levels and 4 timer settings. Feature sleep mode and energy-efficient auto power reduction
